This repository contains the source code and resources of an application called "Wilber".
The name wilber is inspired by the mascot of the GIMP image editor.

Wilber is a user-friendly assistant application designed to help you manage your tasks and reminders efficiently.
It features a clean interface and integrates seamlessly with the GNOME desktop environment.

Wilber is written in Vala and uses GTK4/Adwaita for its graphical user interface.
